Package com.ibm.zrl.idmx.showproof

This package contains the code to implement the Idemix proving protocol.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
Identifier Object used to implement identifiers for hidden and revealed values, commitments and verifiable encryptions in the proof specification.
Proof Data structure for a proof.
ProofSpec Proof specification object as parsed from the corresponding XML file.
Prover The Idemix prover abstraction.
Validation  
Verifier The Idemix show-proof verification side.
 

Enum Summary
Identifier.ProofMode All possible types of identifiers.
 

Package com.ibm.zrl.idmx.showproof Description

This package contains the code to implement the Idemix proving protocol. The main classes are Prover and Verifier representing the named entities. Proofs are specified by the proof specification, which describes what is to be proven about which attribute values from which credential.

See Also:
@see com.ibm.zrl.idmx.showproof.ip @see com.ibm.zrl.idmx.showproof.pe @see com.ibm.zrl.idmx.showproof.predicates, @see com.ibm.zrl.idmx.ve
